desc: Boxed Water Is Better® is a sustainable alternative to plastic bottles and aluminum cans. Our cartons are 92% plant-based and 100% recyclable — the most sustainable package in the water aisle. Boxed Water is working toward a shared goal of creating a better tomorrow, by creating more sustainable solutions today.

layout.text: Taste the subtle hint of natural fruit flavors in our classic 92% plant-based box. Available in Blackberry, Cucumber, Lemon, and Grapefruit.
